Message:
I’ve been a witch since
the day I was born.

Thanks to that,
I got pretty good at
dealing with the Church,
and lying for a living.
I now pretend to be a nun,

pilfering things from the
Church of Longinus’s
followers.

Perhaps I’ve actually been
pretty lucky though—

luckier than other witches
who get caught without even
knowing their true identities.

the most powerful witch
in the Holy See.
